name: a4f-image-gen-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server with A4F that generates images.
author: Kilo Code

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const buildDir = './build'; const srcFile = './A4FImageGen.js'; const targetFile = path.join(buildDir, 'A4FImageGen.js'); if (!fs.existsSync(buildDir)){ fs.mkdirSync(buildDir, { recursive: true }); } fs.copyFileSync(srcFile, targetFile); try { fs.chmodSync(targetFile, '755'); console.log('A4FImageGen build: A4FImageGen.js copied to build directory and chmodded.'); } catch(e) { console.warn('A4FImageGen build: chmod failed, possibly on Windows. File copied.'); }"
